title: LØVE STORY: LzeroVE STORY , When LØVE is not LOVE
description: Torrential rains confine two strangers, a ravishing beauty and an elegant gentleman, to an apartment. In the next thirty-six hours, the enchantress falls for the eligible bachelor, drowns him in her love, and then disappears without a trace. Why?When they find her, she is crazier in love than ever before. Will the end be even more bizarre than the disappearing act?
author: Sumant Gupta
